title: Anand Giridharadas: How We Are Going to Live Together Is Up for Grabs
itunes:title: Anand Giridharadas: How We Are Going to Live Together Is Up for Grabs
description: Anand Giridharadas, writer and author of the book, Winners Take All, discusses the multiple crises we are currently facing, how they could provide an impetus for real change, and how US and global elites are failing to live up to the challenge.
